model_details.description: This model identifies a broad range of 16 semantic types in the input text. It is a reimplementation of Lample (2016) and uses a biLSTM with a CRF layer, character embeddings and ELMo embeddings.
model_details.short_description: This model identifies a broad range of 16 semantic types in the input text. It is a reimplementation of Lample (2016) and uses a biLSTM with a CRF layer, character embeddings and ELMo embeddings.

paper.title: Neural Architectures for Named Entity Recognition

dataset.name: Ontonotes 5.0
dataset.notes: Unfortunately we cannot release this data due to licensing restrictions.
